data.name: Users_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [Users] ADD CONSTRAINT [Users_PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: UsersRoles
SelectRolesByUser
data.value: SELECT [Roles].[Id], [Roles].[Name] FROM [UsersRoles] INNER JOIN [Roles] ON [UsersRoles].[RoleId] = [Roles].[Id] WHERE [UsersRoles].[UserId] = @UserId

data.name: UsersRoles_Users_FKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [UsersRoles] ADD CONSTRAINT [UsersRoles_Users_FKey] FOREIGN KEY ([UserId]) REFERENCES [Users] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION;

data.name: SelectUsersByRole
data.value: SELECT u.[Id],u.[Name],u.[Password],u.[CreateDate],u.[LastLoginDate] FROM [UsersRoles] AS ur INNER JOIN [Users] AS u ON ur.[UserId] = u.[Id] WHERE ur.[RoleId] = @RoleId

data.name: Users
data.value: CREATE TABLE [Users] ( [Id] UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL ROWGUIDCOL, [Name] NVARCHAR (64) NOT NULL UNIQUE, [Password] NVARCHAR (64) NOT NULL, [CreateDate] DATETIME NOT NULL, [LastLoginDate] DATETIME NOT NULL );

data.name: Roles
Roles_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [Roles] ADD CONSTRAINT [Roles_PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: UsersRoles_Roles_FKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [UsersRoles] ADD CONSTRAINT [UsersRoles_Roles_FKey] FOREIGN KEY ([RoleId]) REFERENCES [Roles] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION;

data.name: UsersRoles_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [UsersRoles] ADD CONSTRAINT [UsersRoles_PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([UserId],[RoleId]);
